descripcion: I am a bachelor student of software engineering, I have advanced knowledge and practice in languages such as Java, SQL, C#, C++, HTML, JS, CSS. I have a C1 degree in English language and a B2 certificate from Cambridge University, I also have a certificate of SCRUM Fundamentals, I also have experience with the fundamentals of programming such as the use of design patterns and Object Oriented Programming.
descrProyectos: Projects done in my career as a software engineering student which use a solid base in the handling of different languages and uses such as software design and Object Oriented Programming.
contactForm: Contact form so that you can contact me directly at my e-mail address.

habilidades_tecnicas: Computer skills such as hardware and software management.

Proyecto1.descripcion: Project of a video game made in Unity using different design patterns.

Proyecto2.descripcion: Project focused on creating online services using Azure.

Proyecto3.descripcion: Project focused on the correct use of a NoSQL database such as MongoDB and connection with a store.

Proyecto4.descripcion: Project focused on the creation of a database for a movie rental application.
